name: Tabs.Root

activateOnFocus.description: Whether or not to activate the tab when it receives focus.
activateOnFocus.description_zh: 是否在选项卡获得焦点时激活选项卡。

autoSet.description: Whether or not to automatically set the tab value when it receives focus.
autoSet.description_zh: 是否在接收到焦点时自动设置选项卡值。

loop.description: Whether or not the tabs should loop when navigating with the keyboard.
loop.description_zh: 使用键盘导航时选项卡是否应循环。

asChild.description: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.
asChild.description_zh: 是否对此组件使用渲染委派。

el.description: The underlying DOM element being rendered. You can bind to this to programatically interact with the element.
el.description_zh: 正在呈现的基础 DOM 元素。您可以绑定到此元素以编程方式与元素进行交互。

description: The root tabs component which contains the other tab components.

events.name: onValueChange
events.description: A callback function called when the active tab value changes.
events.description_zh: A callback function called when the active tab value changes.

slots.name: builder
slots.description: The builder attributes and actions to apply to the element if using the asChild prop with delegation.
slots.description_zh: 如果使用带有委托的 asChild 属性，则要应用于元素的构建器属性和操作。

slots.name: value
slots.description_zh: 当前处于活动状态的选项卡值。
